active_incidents.title: Errors when using some apps and integrations in Slack

notes.body:
Upon further investigation we've learned that this issue is not fully resolved. We're continuing to investigate this and we will provide an update as soon as we have more information.

Thank you for your ongoing patience and apologies for the confusion.
We believe the issue should now be resolved. Users should no longer have trouble using certain apps and integrations in Slack. We'll post the summary of this issue as soon as possible.
We're still investigating the issue around using certain apps and integrations in Slack. No additional news to share just yet, but we’ll provide new information as soon as it’s available.
Our investigation is still ongoing at this time and we don’t have any new information to share just yet. We’ll be back with another update in 30 minutes.

Some customers may be experiencing issues using certain apps and integrations in Slack. Workflow Builder and other apps may be impacted. Our team is currently investigating and we'll keep you posted as soon as we have more information. We're sorry for the disruption.
